value.name: Gatherings across Southern California mark 1-year anniversary of George Floyd's murder
value.description: One year after George Floyd was murdered in Minneapolis police custody, several events throughout Southern California Tuesday were held to remember him and reflect on changes after his death sparked waves of protests across the country.
